httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostCustomersCustomerTaxIds

Creates a new TaxID object for a customer.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\customers\{customer}\tax_ids HTTP/1.1

host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded


{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

customer [ in: path type: string ]
required

Request Body Schema

{
  "required": [
    "type",
    "value"
  ],
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "expand": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "maxLength": 5000,
        "type": "string"
      },
      "description": "Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded."
    },
    "type": {
      "maxLength": 5000,
      "enum": [
        "ae_trn",
        "au_abn",
        "au_arn",
        "bg_uic",
        "br_cnpj",
        "br_cpf",
        "ca_bn",
        "ca_gst_hst",
        "ca_pst_bc",
        "ca_pst_mb",
        "ca_pst_sk",
        "ca_qst",
        "ch_vat",
        "cl_tin",
        "eg_tin",
        "es_cif",
        "eu_oss_vat",
        "eu_vat",
        "gb_vat",
        "ge_vat",
        "hk_br",
        "hu_tin",
        "id_npwp",
        "il_vat",
        "in_gst",
        "is_vat",
        "jp_cn",
        "jp_rn",
        "jp_trn",
        "ke_pin",
        "kr_brn",
        "li_uid",
        "mx_rfc",
        "my_frp",
        "my_itn",
        "my_sst",
        "no_vat",
        "nz_gst",
        "ph_tin",
        "ru_inn",
        "ru_kpp",
        "sa_vat",
        "sg_gst",
        "sg_uen",
        "si_tin",
        "th_vat",
        "tr_tin",
        "tw_vat",
        "ua_vat",
        "us_ein",
        "za_vat"
      ],
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Type of the tax ID, one of ae_trn, au_abn, au_arn, bg_uic, br_cnpj, br_cpf, ca_bn, ca_gst_hst, ca_pst_bc, ca_pst_mb, ca_pst_sk, ca_qst, ch_vat, cl_tin, eg_tin, es_cif, eu_oss_vat, eu_vat, gb_vat, ge_vat, hk_br, hu_tin, id_npwp, il_vat, in_gst, is_vat, jp_cn, jp_rn, jp_trn, ke_pin, kr_brn, li_uid, mx_rfc, my_frp, my_itn, my_sst, no_vat, nz_gst, ph_tin, ru_inn, ru_kpp, sa_vat, sg_gst, sg_uen, si_tin, th_vat, tr_tin, tw_vat, ua_vat, us_ein, or za_vat",
      "x-stripeBypassValidation": true
    },
    "value": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Value of the tax ID."
    }
  },
  "additionalProperties": false
}

Responses

  • 200 Successful response.
  • default Error response.
